content: given the circumstances we find ourselves in this year 2020 i decided to create this little guy in a fit of gallows humour also because i can t trust the ads i see on social media selling items like really cute plague doctor plushies most of them are scams and i m a bit ashamed to say i ve been stung before so when we can t buy what we want we make it ourselves it s what crafters do worked in 8ply/dk yarn this project measures approximately 12cm tall stitches used slip_stitch double_crochet decrease crab stitch reverse double_crochet magic_ring random thought plague doctors always remind me of the guys from spy vs spy huh edit 4/10/2025 i have been informed that someone on etsy has copied my pattern and is selling it for a profit the seller s shop is called craftypatterndesigns and the username is badea now i try to recreate designs that i ve seen online but would never stoop so low as to use their photos or their pattern wholesale and without attribution if you see this pattern being sold elsewhere please know that you would save yourself some cash to get it free directly from me pattern thieves suck edit2 4/10/2025 the seller has taken down the listing and agreed to donate any proceeds to charity i am awaiting proof of donation before removing my reference to their store we crafters have to be better people pattern thieves still suck edit3 5/10/25 another thief this time the store name is cozyknitsamigurumi i have a feeling this is a losing battle i don t want to charge for my patterns but i may have to start if it will help me assert my copyright sorry guys
